languages.text: "Я устранил{mf||а} проблему. Ни Идира, ни призрак покойной Теодоры нас больше не побеспокоят. Когда я тут закончу — распорядитесь убрать тела".
"I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. Once I'm finished here, make arrangements for the disposal of the bodies."
languages.original_text: "Я устранил{mf||а} проблему. Ни Идира, ни призрак покойной Теодоры нас больше не побеспокоят. Когда я тут закончу — распорядитесь убрать тела".

traits.locale_text: "I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. Once I'm finished here, make arrangements for the disposal of the bodies."
"I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. Once I'm finished here, make arrangements for the disposal of the bodies."
"I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. Once I'm finished here, make arrangements for the disposal of the bodies."
"I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. Once I'm finished here, make arrangements for the disposal of the bodies."

languages.text: “我已经解决了这个问题。无论是伊迪拉，还是逝世的西奥多拉的幽灵，都不会再找我们的麻烦了。等我处理完这边的事情之后，安排人来处理尸体吧。”
languages.original_text: "I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. Once I'm finished here, make arrangements for the disposal of the bodies."

traits.locale_text: “我已经解决了这个问题。无论是伊迪拉，还是逝世的西奥多拉的幽灵，都不会再找我们的麻烦了。等我处理完这边的事情之后，安排人来处理尸体吧。”

languages.text: «He eliminado el problema. Ni Idira ni el fantasma de la fallecida Theodora volverán a molestarnos. Cuando termine aquí, encárguese de los cuerpos».
languages.original_text: "I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. Once I'm finished here, make arrangements for the disposal of the bodies."

traits.locale_text: «He eliminado el problema. Ni Idira ni el fantasma de la fallecida Theodora volverán a molestarnos. Cuando termine aquí, encárguese de los cuerpos».

languages.text: 「問題は解決した。イディラも亡きテオドラの亡霊も、二度と私たちを悩ませることはない。私のここでの仕事が終わったら、遺体の処理の手配をしてくれ」
languages.original_text: "I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. Once I'm finished here, make arrangements for the disposal of the bodies."

traits.locale_text: 「問題は解決した。イディラも亡きテオドラの亡霊も、二度と私たちを悩ませることはない。私のここでの仕事が終わったら、遺体の処理の手配をしてくれ」

languages.text: "Ich habe das Problem beseitigt. Weder Idira, noch der Geist der verstorbenen Theodora wird uns noch einmal Ärger machen. Sorgt dafür, dass die Leichen entsorgt werden, wenn ich hier fertig bin."
languages.original_text: "I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. Once I'm finished here, make arrangements for the disposal of the bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe das Problem beseitigt. Weder Idira, noch der Geist der verstorbenen Theodora wird uns noch einmal Ärger machen. Sorgt dafür, dass die Leichen entsorgt werden, wenn ich hier fertig bin."

languages.text: « Problème réglé. Ni Idira ni le fantôme de la défunte Théodora ne viendront plus nous importuner. Quand j'en aurai fini ici, prenez les dispositions nécessaires pour nous débarrasser des corps. »
languages.original_text: "I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. Once I'm finished here, make arrangements for the disposal of the bodies."

traits.locale_text: « Problème réglé. Ni Idira ni le fantôme de la défunte Théodora ne viendront plus nous importuner. Quand j'en aurai fini ici, prenez les dispositions nécessaires pour nous débarrasser des corps. »

languages.text: "Sorunu ortadan kaldırdım. İdira ve rahmetli Theodora'nın hayaleti bizi artık rahatsız etmeyecek. Buradaki işim bittikten sonra cesetlerden kurtulmak için gerekli ayarlamaları yapın."
languages.original_text: "I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. Once I'm finished here, make arrangements for the disposal of the bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Sorunu ortadan kaldırdım. İdira ve rahmetli Theodora'nın hayaleti bizi artık rahatsız etmeyecek. Buradaki işim bittikten sonra cesetlerden kurtulmak için gerekli ayarlamaları yapın."
